List of all members.

Properties

NSDecimal orthogonalCoordinateDecimal
CPConstraints constraints
 The constraints used when positioning relative to the plot area. For axes fixed in the plot coordinate system, this is ignored.
BOOL positionedRelativeToPlotArea
 True if the axis is constrained to move relative to the plot area. If false, the axes is fixed relative to the plot coordinates, and moves whenever the plot space ranges change. The default value is NO, meaning the axis is positioned in plot coordinates.

Detailed Description

A 2-dimensional cartesian (X-Y) axis class.
